title: Clarifies the state's obligation to make payments with respect to certain lands
summary: Clarifies the state's obligation to make payments with respect to certain lands acquired by the department of environmental conservation.

       Introduced  by  Sen.  ROBACH -- read twice and ordered printed, and when

       AN ACT to amend chapter 774 of the laws of 1989 amending the real  prop-
         erty  tax  law relating to certain state lands subject to taxation, in
         relation to clarifying the state's obligation to  make  payments  with
         respect to certain lands; and to amend chapter 99 of the laws of 2010,
         relating  to  making  appropriations for the support of government, in
         relation to taxes on public lands

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-

    2  real property tax law relating to certain state lands subject  to  taxa-
    3  tion is amended to read as follows:
    4    S  4.  The  agreements  referred to in section three of this act shall
    5  [enure] INURE to the benefit of and bind the people of the state of  New
    6  York  in  the  event that the lands which are the subject of said agree-
    7  ments are acquired by the people of the state of New York acting through
    8  the department of environmental conservation. Upon  any  acquisition  of
    9  such   lands  by  the  department  of  environmental  conservation,  the
   10  provisions of section 532 of the real property tax law shall  not  apply
   11  to the lands so acquired but the [taxation thereof] PAYMENTS DUE THEREON
   12  shall be governed by the agreements referred to in section three of this
   13  act  for  the duration of such agreement.  IN THE EVENT THAT NO SPECIFIC
   14  APPROPRIATION SHALL HAVE BEEN MADE FOR THAT PURPOSE, THE  AMOUNT  APPRO-
   15  PRIATED  FOR  PAYMENTS  OF TAXES ON STATE LANDS PURSUANT TO SECTIONS 532
   16  THROUGH 546 OF THE REAL PROPERTY TAX LAW SHALL BE  DEEMED  TO  ENCOMPASS
   17  THE  STATE'S  OBLIGATION  TO MAKE THE PAYMENTS REQUIRED BY THIS SECTION,
   18  NOTWITHSTANDING ANY LAW TO THE  CONTRARY,  PROVIDED  THAT  NEITHER  SUCH
   19  PAYMENTS  NOR  THE  ASSESSMENTS  OF  THE  PARCELS TO WHICH SUCH PAYMENTS
